import styles from './rowBookList.module.scss' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { LeftArrowIcon, RightArrowIcon } from 'assets/svgs' interface Props { bookList: { no: number; authors: string[]; thumbnail: string; title: string; isbn: string; publisher: string }[] } export const RowBookList = ({ bookList }: Props) => { return (
    {bookList.map((item, idx) => (
  • {item.no}
    {item.title}
    {item.authors}
    • ))}
) }
